1.name: Lawrence of Arabia
1.description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

2.name: Seppuku
2.description: An elder ronin samurai arrives at a feudal lord's home and requests an honorable place to commit suicide. But when the ronin inquires about a younger samurai who arrived before him things take an unexpected turn.

3.name: Lolita
3.description: A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a fourteen-year-old nymphet.

4.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
4.description: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

5.name: Dr. No
5.description: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

6.name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
6.description: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

7.name: The Longest Day
7.description: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

8.name: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
8.description: A senator, who became famous for killing a notorious outlaw, returns for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.

9.name: How the West Was Won
9.description: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the nineteenth century - including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

10.name: El ángel exterminador
10.description: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

11.name: The Manchurian Candidate
11.description: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

12.name: Carnival of Souls
12.description: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

13.name: Cape Fear
13.description: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.

14.name: Kingu Kongu tai Gojira
14.description: A pharmaceutical company captures King Kong and brings him to Japan, where he escapes from captivity and battles a recently released Godzilla.

15.name: Ivanovo detstvo
15.description: In WW2, twelve year old Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev works for the Soviet army as a scout behind the German lines and strikes a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers.

16.name: The Music Man
16.description: Harold Hill poses as a boys' band leader to con naive Iowa townsfolk.

17.name: Mutiny on the Bounty
17.description: In 1787, British ship Bounty leaves Portsmouth to bring a cargo of bread-fruit from Tahiti but the savage on-board conditions imposed by Captain Bligh trigger a mutiny led by officer Fletcher Christian.

18.name: Cléo de 5 à 7
18.description: Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.

19.name: The Miracle Worker
19.description: The story of Anne Sullivan's struggle to teach the blind and deaf Helen Keller how to communicate.

20.name: Knife in the Water
20.description: On their way to a sailing trip, an aging husband and wife invite along an emphatic young hitchhiker out of sheer patronization.

21.name: Le procès
21.description: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.

22.name: Hatari!
22.description: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.

23.name: Boccaccio '70
23.description: Inspired by Boccaccio's novellas, each episode focuses on sex, love and seduction in Italy's 1960s, an era of economic growth and major cultural changes.

24.name: Le doulos
24.description: A burglar betraying other criminals, prepares for a big heist with a trusted friend that might be as untrustworthy as he.

25.name: Follow That Dream
25.description: A family of ragtag vagabonds sets up a makeshift home on a Florida beach after becoming marooned there, prompting an uptight local bureaucrat to attempt to evict them.

26.name: L'eclisse
26.description: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

27.name: Kid Galahad
27.description: After completing his military service, Walter Gulick takes a job as a sparring partner at a gym, the owner of which sees potential in Walter as a professional fighter and takes him under his wing.

28.name: Taras Bulba
28.description: In the 16th century Ukraine, the Polish overlords and the Cossacks fight for control of the land but frequent Turkish invasions force them to unite against the common Turkish foe.

29.name: Sanjuro
29.description: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

30.name: The 300 Spartans
30.description: A small Army of Greeks spearheaded by three hundred Spartans do battle with the whole invading Persian Army.

31.name: Sodom and Gomorrah
31.description: Sex, torture and betrayal in Biblical Sodom and Gomorrah. Lot, leader of the Hebrews, believes his people can co-exist with the Sodomites, a disastrous decision.

32.name: Jules et Jim
32.description: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

33.name: The Damned
33.description: An American tourist, a youth gang leader, and his troubled sister find themselves trapped in a top secret government facility experimenting on children.

34.name: Days of Wine and Roses
34.description: An alcoholic marries a young woman, whom he systematically addicts to booze so they can share his "passion" together.

35.name: Vivre sa vie: Film en douze tableaux
35.description: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

36.name: Gypsy
36.description: Based on the Broadway hit about the life and times of burlesque dancer Gypsy Rose Lee and her aggressive stage mother, Mama Rose.

37.name: A Kind of Loving
37.description: After his girlfriend's pregnancy forces him to marry her, a young man must adjust to his new life and contend with his domineering mother-in-law.

38.name: L'orribile segreto del Dr. Hichcock
38.description: In 19th century London, a woman weds a doctor with necrophiliac tendencies, and whose first wife died under mysterious circumstances - and might be coming back from the grave to torment her successor.

39.name: Birdman of Alcatraz
39.description: A surly convicted murderer held in permanent isolation redeems himself when he becomes a renowned bird expert.

40.name: Jack the Giant Killer
40.description: A farmboy turned knight must protect a princess from the schemes of an evil wizard.

41.name: Jigsaw
41.description: A woman is found murdered in a house along the coast from Brighton. Local detectives Fellows and Wilks lead an investigation methodically following up leads and clues mostly in Brighton and...                See full summary »

42.name: Sweet Bird of Youth
42.description: Drifter Chance Wayne returns to his hometown after many years of trying to make it in the movies. Arriving with him is a faded film star he picked up along the way, Alexandra Del Lago. ...                See full summary »

43.name: That Touch of Mink
43.description: A rich businessman and a young woman are attracted to each other, but he only wants an affair while she wants to save herself for marriage.

44.name: Tower of London
44.description: The twisted Richard III is haunted by the ghosts of those he has murdered in his attempt to become the King of England.

45.name: Long Day's Journey Into Night
45.description: At the end of a long and hot summer day, members of one family gather in a large house. Everyone has something painful and offensive to say, and their silence is even worse.

46.name: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
46.description: A doctor experimenting with transplant techniques keeps his girlfriend's head alive when she is decapitated in a car crash, then goes hunting for a new body.

47.name: Six Black Horses
47.description: A beautiful woman with an ulterior motive hires two gunslingers to escort her through Indian territory so she can be reunited with her awaiting husband.

48.name: Experiment in Terror
48.description: A man with an asthmatic voice telephones bank clerk Kelly Sherwood at home and coerces her into helping him steal a large sum from her bank.

49.name: Ride the High Country
49.description: An ex-union soldier is hired to transport gold from a mining community through dangerous territory. But what he doesn't realize is that his partner and old friend is plotting to double-cross him.

50.name: Girls! Girls! Girls!
50.description: When he finds out his boss is retiring to Arizona, a sailor has to find a way to buy the Westwind, a boat that he and his father built. He is also caught between two women: insensitive club singer Robin and sweet Laurel.
